response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is tailored to meet your needs perfectly. Given its value and quality, it's worth $120 to us. Considering its worth to you, I'd like to propose an offer of $110 for this product. I believe this price is fair and competitive, allowing you to acquire it at a slight discount while ensuring we receive a reasonable return for our efforts in developing and delivering such a valuable item. Please let me know if this offer suits your budget and preferences.", "product_price": 110}
